Name: Doxxed
About the game: After a botched face-lift, Gin, a movie star, confines herself to her luxury apartment to recover. Under the influence of strong pain medications she makes the mistake of taking to the online blogs - discovering her once adoring fans may have turned against her. A first-person puzzle thriller, you play as Gin as you try to figure out whose responsible for the cryptic messages and strange deliveries arriving at Gin’s apartment. You’ll have to follow clues to discover how Gin’s threatening fans are getting their information, and whether your apartment is really the safest place. Will you escape the constant threat of danger from the fans whose obsession with Gin has turned fatal?
